welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alamo, where the charm of small-town America meets rich history and beautiful landscapes. Get ready to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Allen Miller International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mc Allen Miller International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gen Lucio Blanco Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gen Lucio Blanco Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Valley International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Valley International Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
